title: Stussy font
content:
I really need this font (or one similar). I need all caps. Thank you so much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [stussy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730125055/http:/typophile.com/files/stussy.jpg) | 87.67 KB |
author: kpedz

comments.content:
It looks like your sample is hand-drawn, because the s's are not identical, as well as the observation that the "blackletter" style they used is unconventional. Something like Jason Walcott's "Baroque Text" or "Ferox" by Miles Newlin might have a similar non-traditional blackletter feel.

- Mike Yanega

Sorry I misspelled Miles Newlyn's name.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you so much for your feedback! I will just have to hand draw something of my own then. :-) Thank you.
